long_description: Create a quick and sturdy equalized anchor with the lightweight Mammut Contact Sling Dyneema(R) Cordelette 8.0. Cordelette has a narrow 8mm width and a low-profile connection in place of a knot. Dyneema(R), a polyethylene fiber, is incredibly strong, lightweight and resistant to moisture and ultraviolet light. Contact stitching technique gives the cordelette great handling, even in the area of the seam.
short_description: Create a quick and sturdy equalized anchor with the lightweight Mammut Contact Sling Dyneema(R) Cordelette 8.0.
